meanings.definition: An inexpensive lodging place for travelers, especially young people, that typically has dormitory-style accommodations and shared facilities.
meanings.sent1: Many young travelers choose to stay in hostels to save money while exploring new cities.
meanings.sent2: During their backpacking trip, they stayed in several hostels across Europe.
meanings.sent3: The hostel was so budget-friendly that they joked about feeling like college students again.
meanings.sent4: In the bustling city, the hostel stood out like a cozy oasis for weary travelers.
meanings.sent5: The colorful murals on the walls of the hostel made it a vibrant and welcoming place to rest.
